publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1704 Ms Margaret Curran: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2001—That the Social Justice Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*
